Charan is packing for a vacation and is allowed to carry only 1 bag with capacity X.
He also have N items that he want to take along with him.
Unfortunately he can not fit all of them so he has to choose them.
For Each item it’s size and value are given.
Your task is to maximize the total value of all items charan is going to carry.
 

Input
On the first line you are given X and N. N lines follow with two integers on each line describing one of your items. The first number is the size of the item and the next is the value of the item.

Output
You should output a single integer --the total maximum value from the best choice of items for your trip.

Constraints
Should contain all the constraints on the input data that you may have. Format it like:

1 ≤ N ≤ 5000
1 ≤ X ≤ 5000

Example
Input:
5 5
1 1
2 2
2 3
2 4
2 5

Output:
10
